title: Aatrox Comments
body:
1. This rework can do no-wrong based on his interactions with Taric alone. The "get a haircut" line was fucking incredible. 

2. I will never not pronounce his name with the same convention Aaron got in the Key & Peele Skit "Substitute Teacher"

3. Based on his abilities, I feel like he's a viable support. 

4. Is he supposed to be german? Were they going for a Bane voice? Because it sounds like he got a Bane voice. If that's the case, why the hell didn't we get a "No one cared about my top lane until they reworked my mask" or something?

5. Why couldn't you do something like this for Maokai?

6. What is meant by his interaction with Vel'Koz. Is the void where demons go?

I worked with the actor on the accent for quite a little while  (he's a very talented TV and stage actor).   We intentionally went for something that would be quite hard to place, feel somewhat ancient, and uncommon.

> We intentionally went for something that would be quite hard to place, feel somewhat ancient, and uncommon.

This is always a fun exercise. 

[Random trivia: The narrator of Injustice was going in a similar direction but, obviously, from a very different angle.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TjuJvptBe3M)
Not cool dude. I'm an Aatrox main and I'm not exactly happy with the new voice either but this is unacceptable behavior. Aatrox mains are better than that.

Keep calm Satan

You don't wish death of someone just because you didn't like his work.

I mean, I am not exactly happy about the voice either, but lore looks quitely good and exciting. It connects god-like beings which makes more sense than none knowing each other.

> What is meant by his interaction with Vel'Koz. Is the void where demons go?


In the short bio it mentions that Aatrox has fought against the void and in one of his lines he asks himself if it might not have corrupted him,so I guess it is possible that Aatrox fears that he could become a voidbeast himself.
